tags.name: Processing Speeds
tags.description: Endpoints for managing processing speed options

put.summary: Update share class with more shares
Update status of a requested document
Update status of a requested document

post.summary: Webhook for when a submission is signed by templating engine
Request creation of a new share class (creates a consent that must be signed)
When a signature on equity offer is accepted, execute steps post that action
When a signature on agreement accepted, execute steps post that action
When a signature on consent is accepted, execute steps post that action

get.summary: Stream equity offer events via Server-Sent Events
get.description: Establishes SSE connection to receive real-time equity offer events

get.summary: Stream consent events via Server-Sent Events
get.description: Establishes SSE connection to receive real-time consent events

get.summary: Get all processing speed options for all jurisdictions
get.description: Returns all available processing speed options for all configured jurisdictions, including fees and descriptions

get.summary: Generate the vesting plan preview for this equity offer
Validate user access of equity offer
Get all equity offers by organizationId
Get company name changes by id

finalizedDocumentName.description: The name of the finalized and signed consent document

finalizedDocumentUrl.description: The url of the finalized and signed consent document

signatory.description: User Id who will sign or has signed the document

signatoryEmail.description: User Email who will sign or has signed the document

expiresAt.description: Timestamp when document consent request expires

numVotesRequired.description: Number of votes required for the consent to be either approved or rejected

approve.description: Value is true if vote is to approve; false if vote is to reject

ConsentVote.description: Data Transfer Object for Consent Vote

AcceptSignedEquityOffer.description: Data Transfer Object for Accepting Signed Equity Offer

AcceptSignedAgreement.description: Data Transfer Object for Accepting Signed Agreement

CreateConsentRequest.description: Request object for creating a new consent

majorityReached.description: Boolean indicator whether or not majority of approvals / rejections was reached after this vote

ConsentVoteResponse.description: Data Transfer Object for Consent Vote Response

AcceptSignedConsent.description: Data Transfer Object for Accepting Signed Consent
